about:
Nowadays, the IT sector is booming. Exciting times are ahead of us, as long as you are even slightly talented, you'll be respected in society with a relatively high salary.


I really love this industry, and I'm highly motivated, dynamic, persevering, patient, rigorous and passionate with everything that comes along with it.


I'm Full Stack Developer, mostly in the backend side. Although lacking a bit of experience, I participated in various projects about different topics especially commerce, and on good terms with many different types of people.

projects.title: Certifications Website
projects.description: Scrapes certification exams PDFs from gratisexam and provides a way to take the test online.

projects.title: eCommerce Website
projects.description: For my first big project, my father proposed to me to create a commercial website for him to sell his products online for bigger customer base.

projects.title: Commercial Management Application
projects.description: One day, I found that my father's shop is managed by an expensive application, which lacked a lot of fonctionalities. So for my second big project, I decided to create one myself.

projects.title: Novel Reader Website
projects.description: Scrapes novels from boxnovel, saving them and allows the user to read his novels while saving his progress and allowing him to bookmark his favourite quotes.

projects.title: My Website
projects.description: An exciting project, created using a NextJS, which is a framework of React I was unfamiliar with. Still lacking android integration.
